item.title: Single Point Sensor Systems Main Tanks 2 and 3 Sensors – (Main 1 and 4 Jettison Transfer)

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided main tanks 2 and 3 fuel quantity indicating systems are operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "#2 OR #3 MAIN TANK SINGLE PT SENSORS SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
